00174     public static class ButtonListener6 implements FieldChangeListener {
00175         Citation c;
00176         CitationScreen6 cs6;
00177                     
00178         public ButtonListener6(CitationScreen6 _cs6, Citation _n6){
00179             cs6 = _cs6;
00180             c = _n6;
00181         }
00182                     
00183         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00184             ButtonField btn4 = (ButtonField) field;
00185             if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Next"){ 
00186                 cs6.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00187                 if(cs6.field_alcohol.getChecked() == true){
00188                   UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen7(c));
00189                 }
00190                 else {
00191                   UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen8(c));  
00192                 }      
00193             }
00194             else if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Prev"){
00195                 cs6.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00196                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(cs6);
00197             }   
00198         }
00199     }

00204     private MenuItem saveItem6 = new MenuItem("Save", 110, 10) {
00205         public void run() {
00206                 
00207                 storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00208                 CitationStore.Save(); 
00209                 
00210         }
00211     };
00212 
00213     private MenuItem getItem6 = new MenuItem("Get", 110, 11) {
00214         public void run() {
00215                 
00216                 CitationStore.Restore();
00217                 restoreUIFieldsFromCitation();
00218            
00219         }
00220     };     
00221    
00222     
00226     private void storeUIFieldsToCitation()
00227     {    
00228         String accidentStatus = field_accident.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00229         String radarStatus = field_radar.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00230         String jailStatus = field_jail_booking.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00231         String pacedStatus = field_paced.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00232         String schoolStatus = field_school_zone.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00233         String alcoholStatus = field_alcohol.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00234 
00235         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.ACCIDENT, accidentStatus);  
00236         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.RADAR, radarStatus);  
00237         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.JAIL_BOOKING, jailStatus);  
00238         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.PACED, pacedStatus);  
00239         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.SCHOOL_ZONE, schoolStatus);
00240         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.ALCOHOL, alcoholStatus); 
00241         
00242         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.VBFI, field_vbfi.getText());
00243         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.SPEED_LIMIT, field_speed_limit.toString());
00244         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.ALLEGED_SPEED, field_alleged_speed.getText());
00245     }
00246     
00251     private void restoreUIFieldsFromCitation()
00252     {
00253         boolean accidentStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.ACCIDENT).equals("true");
00254         boolean radarStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.RADAR).equals("true");
00255         boolean jailStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.JAIL_BOOKING).equals("true");
00256         boolean pacedStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.PACED).equals("true");
00257         boolean alcoholStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.ALCOHOL).equals("true");
00258         
00259         field_accident.setChecked(accidentStatus);
00260         field_radar.setChecked(radarStatus);
00261         field_jail_booking.setChecked(jailStatus);
00262         field_paced.setChecked(pacedStatus);
00263         field_alcohol.setChecked(alcoholStatus);
00264         
00265         field_vbfi.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.VBFI));
00266         field_speed_limit.setSelectedIndex(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.SPEED_LIMIT));
00267         field_alleged_speed.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.ALLEGED_SPEED));
00268     }    
00269 }
